title: What is electronic recyclers and hardware data destruction? - Quora

response.answer_text: Today, electronic recycling is very important for the processing of any electronic devices, and employees who are engaged in this called as electronic recyclers. If you want to delete data from hard drives, you should use special software for the wiping. But sometimes it does not help to completely get rid of the data on the disk. A specialist from allgreenrecycling.com recommended using hard drive shredding to wipe data from your hard drive completely.

Electronic recyclers: Electronic recyclers are the professionals who are fully certified in performing the safe disposal of e-waste. Ther are highly trained in following certified procedures to dispose of electronic waste. Data Destruction: It is a kind of process that is used to destroy the data stored on electronic devices like hard drives and other forms of media. The data that is destroyed by the professional is no longer accessible by any unauthorized person.
